actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to remove the 100 percent tariff imposed on soups and broths from France and Germany.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to eliminate the 100% duty on soups and broths from France and Germany.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to remove the 100 percent tariff imposed on soups and broths from France and Germany.
